Review Rating Following on from the latest version of the BMW 3 Series Saloon comes the new 2012 BMW 3 Series Touring. read more Improved boot space, efficient and economical diesel engines, premium image Servicing and maintenance could be costly Review provided by: The following features are fitted on this car...
